Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Interface View

All Superinterfaces:
ViewObserver
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientCLI, ClientGUI
public interface View extends ViewObserver
This interface defines all the common methods that every view must implement in its own way. - for Cli: simple printing layouts - for Gui: different javafx graphic modifies

    • printMatchResults

      void printMatchResults​(String message, Map<String,​Integer> ranking)
      Shows the final match ranking. Implementation may change consistently depending on the type of View used.
      Parameters:
      message - an end match message
      ranking - the non-sorted ranking map

    • printRetry

      void printRetry​(String errMessage, StateName currentState, LightMatch match)
      Graphically notifies the player about a bad choice he has done. Implementation may change consistently depending on the type of View used.
      Parameters:
      errMessage - the error message
      currentState - the state after the unacceptable move (usually the same as before)
      match - the match
